Package com.audiostreaming

package com.audiostreaming
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    Main application entry point for the Audio Streaming server/client.
    AudioHandler
    Handles audio capture, encoding, transmission, reception, and playback.
    AudioStreamingUI
    Discord-like voice chat UI built with Swing.
    Server
    Audio streaming server that forwards UDP audio frames between clients and maintains a TCP control channel for registration, presence, and commands such as JOIN, LEAVE, MUTE, and UNMUTE.
    TcpControlChannel
    Manages the TCP control channel for communication with the server.
    VoiceChatClient
    Voice chat client that manages TCP control channel and UDP audio streaming.
